actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize a 5-year extension of the period of temporary admission into the United States for certain residents of Chile who are in the United States as nonimmigrant aliens.

summary.text: Authorizes a five-year extension of the period of temporary admission into the United States for specified residents of Chile who are presently in the United States as nonimmigrant aliens.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a 5-year extension of the period of temporary admission into the United States for certain residents of Chile who are in the United States as nonimmigrant aliens.
